lead_paragraph: An obituary on Thursday about the Hall of Fame quarterback Sammy Baugh misstated the year he was a first-round draft pick by the Washington Redskins. It was 1937, not 1936.
snippet: An obituary on Thursday about the Hall of Fame quarterback Sammy Baugh misstated the year he was a first-round draft pick by the Washington Redskins. It was 1937, not 1936.
